Sentencas: The BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glasses manufactured for solid oxide fuel cell(SOFC) sealing were studied.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants

Sentencas: The effect of different n(BaO)/n(B2O3) on crystal, thermal properties, density and infrared spectra of this system has been discussed.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants

Sentencas: The results show that the trends of crystallization, glass transformation temperature, dilatometric softening temperature and density increase with n(BaO)/n(B2O3) values.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants

Sentencas: But a typical property deviation occurs when n(BaO)/n(B2O3) is 0.875, and its coefficient of thermal expansion has the maximum at this point.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants

Sentencas: The changes of properties can attribute to the conversion of boron from tetrahedral coordination to trigonal, breakage of the local glass network and interaction between the network modifiers.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants

Sentencas: These can be proved by infrared spectra of glasses.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants

Sentencas: Thermal properties of some studied samples are suitable for the sealing of SOFC using Sm doped ceria electrolyte and operating at 400 similar to 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Structure and properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3 glass sealants
